alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 6:13PM CST until February 26 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CST FOR WHEELER...GRAY...COLLINGSWORTH AND DONLEY COUNTIES... At 613 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Codman to 6 miles southwest of Lefors to 8 miles northwest of Brice, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Wellington, Clarendon, Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lefors, Howardwick, Hedley, Dodson, Lelia Lake, Lake Mcclellan, Twitty, Dozier, Alanreed, Greenbelt Lake, Lutie, New Mobeetie and Allison. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Do not drive into areas where blowing dust restricts visibility.
